snippet: The company is expected to unveil a streaming music service and other software, including a refreshed mobile operating system, at the opening of its annual developers conference Monday.
abstract: Apple is expected to unveil streaming music service to compete with services like Pandora, Spotify and Rdio at its annual developers conference; company is also expected to introduce other software, including overhaul to its mobile operating system.
lead_paragraph: The company is expected to unveil a streaming music service and other software, including a refreshed mobile operating system, at the opening of its annual developers conference Monday.

headline.seo: Apple Enters Busy Field of Streaming Radio
headline.main: Apple Enters Net Radio’s Busy Field
headline.print_headline: Apple Enters Net Radio’s Busy Field
